title: Ticket #5033: Have classad attribute identifying all jobs in a workflow
description:
We should have some ClassAd attribute that's the same for all jobs in a workflow, no matter how deeply nested (including the top-level DAGMan job itself). (DAGManJobId only has the job's immediate parent, so if you have more than one level of nested DAG it won't work; and the top-level DAGMan job itself doesn't have this attribute.)

Maybe it could be something like TopLevelDAGManJobId or WorkflowId? Or maybe we could use the upcoming BatchName feature?

At any rate, the idea is to have an attribute that could be used in a constraint to condor_q, etc., that would get you all jobs in a given workflow.
